item.name: Axe of the Earth
entries: While you are wielding this weapon, as an action you may slam the axe into the ground. You and all creatures adjacent must succeed a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spell.name: Soaring Harmony
entries: You sing a song that calls two tiny songbird spirits from the Faewilds to aid you.
Target a creature you can see within range and choose Villainize or Idolize.
• A creature Villainized is attacked and must make a Dexterity saving throw, or take {@damage 2d4} piercing damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
• A creature Idolised will be aided and invigorated by the birds. If the target makes an attack roll before your next turn, their first roll is made with advantage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 4d4}), 11th level ({@dice 6d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 8d4}).
